duties_responsibilities.duty: Proactively identify and pursue new opportunities by prospecting clients in various industries and setting up client-needs analysis meetings (CNAs)

Being a consultant to understand your clients’ objectives, budgets and target demographics. Recommending the most effective billboard locations and helping guide them through the creative process to maximize their ROI.
Prepare a customized proposal that shows the benefits of partnering with Times Shamrock Outdoor and what we can do to help their business grow.

Work closely with our Director of Outdoor Media, creative department, scheduling departing and finance office to ensure the seamless execution of your clients advertising campaign while providing them exceptional service.
Stay up to date with industry trends, competitive analysis and market insights to identify new opportunities for growth.
Work with the Director of Outdoor Media to develop a strategy to hit your sales goals on a monthly basis.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Advertising or a related field preferred but not required.
